long_description: The Smith Backdrop Polarchromic sunglasses offer sharp detailing and a great fit-perfect for sun-filled adventures. Polarchromic lenses automatically adjust tint according to light conditions; lenses are perfect for high altitude and open water environments. Polarchromic lenses maximize colors and depth perception while reducing glare. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare for increased sharpness and decreased eye fatigue. Lightweight Techlite(TM) lenses feature high-quality borosilicate glass that is polished and chemically tempered for increased shatter resistance. Frames are made from a bio-plastic derived from non-GMO castor seeds and lightweight nylon for a resilient, consistent fit. Hydrophilic megol nose and temple pads keep glasses in place when the activity level rises. 8-base-curve lenses: the higher the number the more curved the lens-Smith features sunglasses with 6, 7, 8 and 9 base curvature. Sized to fit medium faces.
